Method Detail

decrypt

public static def decrypt(def data, String password)
Decrypts a byte array and returns the result. In case of an error, it returns null

decryptBase64

public static String decryptBase64(String data, String password, boolean trim)
Decrypts a base64-encoded string and returns the result. In case of an error, it returns null

encrypt

public static def encrypt(def data, String password)
Encrypts a byte array and returns the result

encryptBase64

public static String encryptBase64(def data, String password)
Encrypts a byte array and returns a base64-encoded string

encryptBase64

public static String encryptBase64(String data, String password)
Encrypts a string and returns the result base64-encoded

process

public static def process(def data, String password, boolean encrypting)
Encrypts or decrypts a byte array.
param:
data Data to be encrypted or decrypted
param:
password Password to use
param:
encrypting Are we encrypting or decrypting?
